Name: 2020: THE RIDE
About the game: 2020: THE RIDE is a year in review in the form of the world’s scariest VR roller coaster. When the economy drops, you drop. When Covid-19 rates speed up, you speed up. Travel through natural disasters, protests and political turmoil in a ride you’ll never forget (no matter how badly you wish you could).
